result.issue: By default, a feature inherits the style information from the dataset.
result.line: By default, a feature inherits the style information from the dataset.

result.issue: A feature can (and should in most cases) be linked to a style in the dataset's table of styles. This can save lots of storage space when the same styles are reused often.
result.line: A feature can (and should in most cases) be linked to a style in the dataset's table of styles. This can save lots of storage space when the same styles are reused often.

result.issue: Finally, a feature can have its own complete style definition.

Web Coordinate Transformation Service

OGR WCTS -
Web Coordinate Transformation Service

result.issue:
The Web Coordinate Transformation Service enables the transformation
of geometries between different coordinate reference systems (CRS).
result.line:
The Web Coordinate Transformation Service enables the transformation
of geometries between different coordinate reference systems (CRS).

result.issue:

• 4326: Lat/Long WGS84
• 4269: Lat/Long NAD83
• 4267: Lat/Long NAD27
...

result.line: The three view modes allow you to explore tracks in different ways:

result.issue: Click on the "Terrain Profile" icon in the tool bar.
result.line: • Click on the "Terrain Profile" icon in the tool bar.

result.issue: Select the View->Terrain Profile... menu option
The top-left 'pulldown' menu lets you set the terrain profile graph size to "Small", "Medium" or "Large".

result.line: Profile at Screen Center places the terrain cross section constantly at the center of the view. You manipulate the globe to change the terrain measured.

result.issue: Profile Under Cursor places the center of the cross section at the cursor (mouse) position. Moving the cursor moves the cross section over the globe's surface.
result.line: Profile Under Cursor places the center of the cross section at the cursor (mouse) position. Moving the cursor moves the cross section over the globe's surface.

result.issue: The following controls let you adjust the terrain profile size and behavior:
result.line: The following controls let you adjust the terrain profile size and behavior:

result.issue: Proportional: determines whether the width and height of the profile graph are to the same scale.
result.line: • Proportional: determines whether the width and height of the profile graph are to the same scale.

result.issue: MSL Base determines whether the graph shows elevations relative to mean sea level or the current minimum elevation along the cross section.
result.line: • MSL Base determines whether the graph shows elevations relative to mean sea level or the current minimum elevation along the cross section.

result.issue: Show A/C Position determines whether the aircraft position should be indicated in the profile. The aircraft point can be shown only when the terrain profile position is "Under Aircraft".
result.line: • Show A/C Position determines whether the aircraft position should be indicated in the profile. The aircraft point can be shown only when the terrain profile position is "Under Aircraft".

result.issue: Profile Width lets you increase the perpendicular profile extent on both sides of the track.
result.line: • Profile Width lets you increase the perpendicular profile extent on both sides of the track.

result.issue: Profile Length when the profile is set to be under the aircraft, lets you increase the 'along the track' profile extent both ahead and behind the aircraft.
result.line: • Profile Length when the profile is set to be under the aircraft, lets you increase the 'along the track' profile extent both ahead and behind the aircraft.

result.issue: Same Size when checked both profiles will have the same extent.
result.line: • Same Size when checked both profiles will have the same extent.

result.issue: Whole Track Length when checked, the 'along the track' profile will cover the whole track length.
result.line: • Whole Track Length when checked, the 'along the track' profile will cover the whole track length.
